info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 27 at 8:49PM CDT until March 27 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
FFWBRO
The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Cameron County in deep south Texas...
* Until 1145 PM CDT.
* At 849 PM CDT, Emergency Management reported swift water rescues underway in La Feria. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Western Cameron County. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Harlingen, La Feria, La Feria Public Library, La Feria Police Department, La Feria High School, La Feria North, La Feria Reservoir, Adams Gardens, Solis, Bixby and Stuart Place.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WESTERN CAMERON COUNTY
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 11:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 11:45 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WESTERN CAMERON COUNTY
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 11:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 11:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
